task.title: Creating Subcollections
task.shortdesc: You can create subcollections within your top-level collection.

context.p: You can store items in subcollections just as you would in a top-level collection. Adding an item to a subcollection does not duplicate the item, even if it appears in another collection.

choices.choice: Drag an existing collection onto another collection
Right-click an existing collection and select New Subcollection

step.info: You can convert a subcollection into a top-level collection by dragging it out of the collection and dropping it into empty space in the left Zotero pane.
